title: v2.15.0 is ready
content:
Features:
- More exporting options:
  + Only selected area
  + Layers to individual PNGs
  + Frames to individual PNGs
  + Trimming
- New version availability alert
- Undo/redo buttons and opacity slider can be hidden

Enhancements:
- Significantly improved performance when having many frames and layers
- Bottom bar bounds info will remain active as long as there is a selection
- Make it a bit easier to activate the quick eye dropper with pencil

Fix:
- Color hex code input strange behavior
- Split screen not working properly sometimes
